feed.title: Milind Shah
feed.subtitle: This blog is a way for me to learn Markdown and share my thoughts, opinions, ideas, online tools, books, movies, parks & museums. Occasionally, I might post photos from my travel experiences possibly with trip itineraries and hyperlapses when I experiment with the camera.

entry.title: Welcome to my Jekyll-powered Blog!
entry.content:
